# kAudioSessionOverrideAudioRoute_Speaker

**Global Variable**

Specifies, for the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/kAudioSessionCategory_PlayAndRecord] category,  that output audio should go to the speaker, not the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
var kAudioSessionOverrideAudioRoute_Speaker: Int { get }
```

## Constants

- **kAudioSessionOverrideAudioRoute_None**: Specifies, for the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/kAudioSessionCategory_PlayAndRecord] category, that output audio should go to the receiver. This is the default output audio route for this category.
